Tau Compiler
Verbose -optVerbose Turn on verbose debugging message
KeepFiles -optKeepFiles Does not remove intermediate .pdb and .inst.* files
TauSelectFile -optTauSelectFile Specify selective instrumentation file for tau_instrumentor
DetectMemoryLeaks -optDetectMemoryLeaks Track mallocs/frees using TAU's memory wrapper
PdtGnuFortranParser -optPdtGnuFortranParser Specify the GNU gfortran PDT parser gfparse instead of f95parse
PdtDir -optPdtDir PDT architecture directory. Typically $(PDTDIR)/$(PDTARCHDIR)
PdtF95Opts -optPdtF95Opts Options for Fortran parser in PDT (f95parse)
PdtF95Reset -optPdtF95Reset Reset options to the Fortran parser to the given list
PdtCOpts -optPdtCOpts Options for C parser in PDT (cparse). Typically $(TAU_MPI_INCLUDE) $(TAU_INCLUDE) $(TAU_DEFS)
PdtCReset -optPdtCReset Reset options to the C parser to the given list
PdtCxxOpts -optPdtCxxOpts Options for C++ parser in PDT (cxxparse). Typically $(TAU_MPI_INCLUDE) $(TAU_INCLUDE) $(TAU_DEFS)
PdtCxxReset -optPdtCxxReset Reset options to the C++ parser to the given list
PdtF90Parser -optPdtF90Parser Specify a different Fortran parser. For e.g., f90parse instead of f95parse
PdtUser -optPdtUser Optional arguments for parsing source code
TauInstr -optTauInstr Specify location of tau_instrumentor. Typically $(TAUROOT)/$(CONFIG_ARCH)/bin/tau_instrumentor
PreProcess -optPreProcess Preprocess the source code before parsing. Uses /usr/bin/cpp -P by default.
CPP -optCPP Specify an alternative preprocessor and pre-process the sources.
CPPOpts -optCPPOpts Specify additional options to the C pre-processor.
CPPReset -optCPPReset Reset C preprocessor options to the specified list.
PDBFile -optPDBFile Specify PDB file for tau_instrumentor. Skips parsing stage.
Tau -optTau Specify options for tau_instrumentor
Compile -optCompile Options passed to the compiler by the user.
TauDefs -optTauDefs Options passed to the compiler by TAU. Typically $(TAU_DEFS)
TauIncludes -optTauIncludes Options passed to the compiler by TAU. Typically $(TAU_MPI_INCLUDE) $(TAU_INCLUDE)
IncludeMemory -optIncludeMemory Flags for replacement of malloc/free. Typically -I$(TAU_DIR)/include/Memory
Reset -optReset Reset options to the compiler to the given list
Linking -optLinking Options passed to the linker. Typically $(TAU_MPI_FLIBS) $(TAU_LIBS) $(TAU_CXXLIBS)
LinkReset -optLinkReset Reset options to the linker to the given list
TauCC -optTauCC Specifies the C compiler used by TAU
OpariTool -optOpariTool Specifies the location of the Opari tool
OpariDir -optOpariDir Specifies the location of the Opari directory
OpariOpts -optOpariOpts Specifies optional arguments to the Opari tool
OpariReset -optOpariReset Resets options passed to the Opari tool
NoMpi -optNoMpi Removes -l*mpi* libraries during linking (default)
Mpi -optMpi Does not remove -l*mpi* libraries during linking
NoRevert -optNoRevert Exit on error. Does not revert to the original compilation rule on error.
Revert -optRevert Revert to the original compilation rule on error (default).
AppCC -optAppCC Specifies the fallback C compiler.
AppCXX -optAppCXX Specifies the fallback CXX compiler.
AppF90 -optAppF90 Specifies the fallback F90 compiler.
